sentences.sContent: So did Senator Sam Nunn, with the caveat that he wanted to wait and see what further stories came out.
sentences.sContent_eng: So did Senator Sam Nunn, with the caveat that he wanted to wait and see what further stories came out.
sentences.sCn: 萨姆.纳恩参议员也一样，但他也告诫称：他想等着瞧，看还有什么事情会被踢爆出来。
